description: Try this clever recipe hack with Cadbury Caramilk hot cross buns. Turn them into tasty churros and dunk them in a decadent Caramilk chocolate sauce.
name: Caramilk Hot Cross Bun Churros Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 4 Cadbury Caramilk hot cross buns, split

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 200°C/180°C fan-forced. Cut hot cross buns into 2cm-wide strips. Place on a baking paper-lined baking tray. Brush all over with butter. Bake for 15 minutes or until golden and crisp.
Meanwhile, place cream and chocolate in a microwave-safe bowl and microwave on high for 1 minute, stirring with a metal spoon halfway through, or until melted. Transfer to a small bowl.
Combine sugar and cinnamon in a small, shallow dish. Toss hot cross bun strips, in batches, in cinnamon sugar, then arrange on a serving plate. Serve with Caramilk sauce.
